channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Donald Trump warned not to pull out of Paris climate agreement—by the CEO of oil giant Exxon Mobil
item.description: A reversal of Biden's decision four years ago to return to the landmark U.N. climate agreement would create a harmful yo-yo effect for businesses that...

item.title: NovaVax’s stock slides 7% as guidance is lowered
Wall Street sees a buying opportunity in these mining stocks as bitcoin marches to new records
item.description: Some bitcoin miners are giving investors an opportunity to get in on the cryptocurrency's big postelection rally.

item.title: Pfizer explores sale of hospital drugs unit, Reuters reports
item.description: Pfizer is exploring the sale of its hospital drugs unit, according to three people familiar with the matter, Reuters reports.

item.title: Exclusive: Ex-Netflix, Uber CMO Bozoma Saint John launches her own haircare and wig brand—with ‘a couple million’ of her own money
item.description: Saint John is known for building the brands of some of the world's most influential companies, now she's launching her own line.

item.title: These 11 bank stocks are trading at low valuations despite ‘Trump bump’
Exclusive: The secretive Goldman Sachs pipeline that helps cash-poor founders tap into their vast wealth
item.description: Some of America's most successful founders are cash-poor and rely on personal liquidity loans to live lavish lifestyles.

item.title: Leading China investor Fred Hu advises Beijing to ‘stay cool’ amid Trump tariff threat
item.description: If China retaliates to a trade war, "that’s a lose-lose with global ramifications,” said Primavera founder Fred Hu at the Fortune Global Forum.

item.title: Hertz’s stock dives after wider-than-forecast loss
Honeywell’s stock surges into record territory on Honeywell stake
Supreme Court rejects Mark Meadows appeal in Georgia election interference case
item.description: Donald Trump's former White House chief of staff failed in his bid to move the case to federal court to mount immunity arguments.

item.title: AT&T CEO: A looming airwave gap will bring higher cellphone bills
item.description: Wireless networks need electromagnetic spectrum—and a lot of it—to send data.

item.title: Trump is the most pro-stock-market president the republic has had: Jeremy Siegel
Apple needs all four of its iPhones to be popular if it's going to reignite sales
item.description: Every year since 2020, when Apple moved to a four-model lineup, one of them has lagged in terms of sales.

item.title: Family offices becoming 'economic powerhouse' in private company deals
item.description: Family offices are increasingly bypassing private equity funds and buying stakes in private companies directly, according to a new survey.
